title: Frostbutt Irelia
body: Splash art not that great(butt has been nerfed sadly). In game is really cool with nice vfx. im a bit disappointed it doesnt have a unique recall animation like  infiltrator. Maybe if we ask for it RITO can bless us with one? Also why not blue hair like the original?

replies.body: She will be getting a recall, it is still getting animated!

Please get rid of the fur (white thing) on her neck, it isn't necessary and completely ruins the meaning of the frost blade. Frostblade Irelia means she is the bloody coldest FROST, she doesn't need the stupid looking fur.

I liked it better when Frostblade Irelia had a fullbody suit, not one that exposes her hands and shoulders and does not quite make sense for someone to have part of their bodies exposed to the winter environment (yes I know other winter champs and skins expose parts of their arms or legs but I prefer something that stuck closer to the original design).

1) get rid of it completely or
2) make it significantly smaller to reduce dominant look

I completely agree. Like sure, I can deal with a little bit less of that fucking amazing armour (I still hate that she's losing it, the skin and the splash art personally had some of the nice colours I've seen in a while in league), but that fur makes her look like an aristocratic snob in some posh fur coat.  Irelia is a bruiser who has gone through a war and now she looks like a lady trying to get into the winter fashion show. Please for the sake of all of the people who love the old skin, reduce the fur and try to make her look as badass as her character should be. Like at this point, infiltrator looks a lot more badass with it's armour and colours.
I hope she forms a snowflake with her ice blades ^^

How about Nightblade Irelia, will that get anything?

I doubt it.
Frostblade is 975 and new recalls are standard for that.

Nightblade on the other hand is a 520-skin,which are usually just model changes.

Alright then explain Shadow Eve that got a new back animation and new particles while being 520

Or Crabgot that got new Particles and a Voice Filter for only being 520

Because sometimes when they rework a champ,they make some skins better than their price tag would suggest.
Most likely this happened because both Urgot and Eve didn't have a lot of skins with special effects.

It's the exception though,not the norm,so I'm just saying you shouldn't get your hopes up too much.
Eve  doesn't even have skins that are 975 or higher (all her skins are 750 and lower), so she needed some extra love.
Not even a single special VO :(
